id: Social network Gab, a home for anti-Semitic speech, produced some of its own
paragraph: FOLLOW CNN BUSINESS By Jose Pagliery and Konstantin Toropin, CNN InvestigatesUpdated 7:42 PM ET, Tue October 30, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Gab, the tiny social media website used by the accused Pittsburgh synagogue shooter that has become a haven for white supremacists, defends itself as an unbiased home for unfettered speech. But the company has itself taken part in anti-Semitic commentary, deleted tweets show.CNN's Blake Ellis and Melanie Hicken contributed to this report.Most stock quote data provided by BATS.
